1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Will the friendship between four-year-old scarlett and 84-year-old beryl blossom and grow? Also featuring sylvia, who is 102 and was born during world war one, and victor, who is 97.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: This time the three-year-olds and the 102-year-olds visit a maze for a memory test. Will 81-year-old lavinia ever find her way out? And a new friendship blossoms over a plate of chips.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The group face a series of challenges with a tram journey and a trip to the supermarket - will everyone return from the shops in tact? And do chickens have belly buttons?

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: A fierce rivalry breaks out between 102-year-old Sylvia and 87-year-old Ken as they face-off on opposing teams during sports day.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: It's the end of the experiment. As the kids graduate to big school, it's time for a jive, a waltz, and for the older group to see if their memory, mobility and mood has improved.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: If four-year-olds and 84-year-olds work and play together, will it improve the health and happiness of the older group? Ten pre-schoolers welcome 11 pensioners into their classroom.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The pre-schoolers and pensioners have been at the same nursery for three weeks now. Can this ambitious experiment transform the way we care for our increasingly older population?

imdb.title: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas
akas: Old people's home for 4 year olds: christmas (United Kingdom)
plot: Pre-schoolers share their classroom with pensioners for six weeks. What impact does this intergenerational experiment have on the health and happiness of the older group.
